definition: touching with the tongue, wash or flow against
details:
noun
- touching with the tongue
= example: touching with the tongue
= synonyms: lick
- movement once around a course
= example: movement once around a course
= synonyms: circle, circuit
- a flap that lies over another part
= example: a flap that lies over another part
= synonyms: overlap
- the part of a piece of clothing that covers the thighs
= example: the part of a piece of clothing that covers the thighs
= synonyms: lap covering
- the upper side of the thighs of a seated person
= example: the upper side of the thighs of a seated person
- an area of control or responsibility
= example: an area of control or responsibility
verb
- wash or flow against
= synonyms: wash, lave
- take up with the tongue
= example: take up with the tongue
= synonyms: lick
- pass the tongue over
= synonyms: lick
- move with or cause to move with a whistling or hissing sound
= synonyms: swish, swoosh, swosh
- lie partly over or alongside of something or of one another
